title: What temperature kills grass seed?
description: What Temperature Kills Grass Seed? Excessive heat or extreme cold can jeopardize grass seed germination. Grass seed typically dies when exposed to temperatures consistently above 100°F (38°C) or below 10°F (-12°C). Understanding Grass Seed Vulnerability Grass…

la: Septentrionalis Canadae terram calefacit, et nostra infrastructura non est parata. Permafrost domos et communitates trans Canadam septentrionalem sustinet. Tamen, sicut calefacit clima, permafrost liquefaciens provocationes significantes ponit pro infrastructura.

title: Your body feels cold in two different ways
description: Researchers have uncovered that the body uses different molecular systems to sense cold in the skin versus internal organs. This explains why surface chills feel very different from cold experienced deep inside the body.
content: Researchers led by Félix Viana, co-director of the Sensory Transduction and Nociception laboratory at the Institute for Neurosciences (IN), have discovered that the body does not sense cold in a sing… [+4063 chars]

Forscher haben herausgefunden, dass der Körper unterschiedliche molekulare Systeme nutzt, um Kälte in der Haut und nicht in inneren Organen zu spüren. Dies erklärt, warum sich oberflächlicher Schüttelfrost ganz anders anfühlt als Kälte tief im Inneren des Körpers.
en: Your body feels cold in two different ways. Researchers have uncovered that the body uses different molecular systems to sense cold in the skin versus internal organs. This explains why surface chills feel very different from cold experienced deep inside the body.
la: Corpus tuum duobus modis frigidum sentit. Investigatores detexerunt corpus diversis systematibus hypotheticis utatur ad sensum frigidum in cute versus viscera interna. Inde est, quod superficies friget valde differt a frigidis experta in alto corpore.

title: Why Diesel Fuel Gels In The Cold, But Gas Doesn't
description: Diesel fuel gels in the cold because it has paraffin wax, which crystalizes in low temperatures. Gas doesn't use this wax, so it doesn't gel in the cold.
content: Diesel engines are famous for reliability, longevity, and torque until winter shows up and reminds them that chemistry still applies. Diesel fuel, which is pricey nowadays, behaves differently in the… [+1316 chars]

en: Why Diesel Fuel Gels In The Cold, But Gas Doesn't. Diesel fuel gels in the cold because it has paraffin wax, which crystalizes in low temperatures. Gas doesn't use this wax, so it doesn't gel in the cold.
la: Cur Diesel Fuel Gels In Frigido, Sed Gas Non. Diesel cibus nes in frigidis, quia ceram paraffin habet, quae in frigidis temperaturis crystallizat. Gas hac cera non utatur, frigore ergo non gel.

title: Continental outflow shapes the circum-Antarctic pattern of summertime atmospheric mercury depletion zones
description: Air flowing out from the Antarctic continent largely determines where summer atmospheric mercury depletion events (AMDEs) occur around Antarctica, making them most common in areas where Antarctic cold, downslope winds meet.
content:
<li>Ariya, P. A. et al. Mercury physicochemical and biogeochemical transformation in the atmosphere and at atmospheric interfaces: a review and future directions. Chem. Rev.115, 37603802 (2015).
Goo… [+10424 chars]
de: Der kontinentale Abfluss prägt das Muster der sommerlichen atmosphärischen Quecksilberabbauzonen rund um die Antarktis. Die aus dem antarktischen Kontinent ausströmende Luft bestimmt weitgehend, wo in der Umgebung der Antarktis sommerliche atmosphärische Quecksilberabbauereignisse (AMDEs) auftreten, weshalb sie am häufigsten in Gebieten auftreten, in denen antarktische, abfallende Winde aufeinandertreffen.
en: Continental outflow shapes the circum-Antarctic pattern of summertime atmospheric mercury depletion zones. Air flowing out from the Antarctic continent largely determines where summer atmospheric mercury depletion events (AMDEs) occur around Antarctica, making them most common in areas where Antarctic cold, downslope winds meet.
la: Effluxus continentalis format zonas circum-antarcticae hydrargyri aestatis atmosphaericas mercurialis deperditionem. Aer e continenti Antarctico effluxus late determinat ubi eventus atmosphaerici mercurii aestatis circa Antarcticam deperditionem occurrunt, easque frequentissimas in locis ubi antarctici frigoris, declivi venti conveniunt.
